articles.author: Lim Hui Jie
articles.title: Seven & i to replace CEO in May, list North American subsidiary in second half of 2026 - CNBC
articles.description: CEO Ryuichi Isaka will step down from May 27, with lead outside director Stephen Dacus taking up the role on the same day.
articles.content:
A customer is seen inside a 7-Eleven convenience store along a street in central Tokyo on September 9, 2024.  
Seven & i Holdings, the parent of 7-Eleven, said Thursday it will replace CEO Ryuic… [+3395 chars]
